profileData.description: I am a professional on the IT field, able to adapt to different environments and work under pressure. Love working as a team in a way to achieve the goals of the company, always following the strategies and guidelines provided by the organization. During my professional career I have been able to develop mostly in the QA field where I have gone from some basic manual testing to some advanced automated testing. I have over 6 years of experience in software quality assurance.

employmentHistory.title: QA Automation Enginner
duties: Tracked, documented, and reported quality levels and perform analysis for quality improvement initiatives.
Create and maintain our automation framework using selenium with C# and NUnit.
Write, design, and execute automated tests by creating scripts that run testing functions automatically
Determine the priority for test scenarios and create execution plans to implement these scenarios
Test different parts of the system including API using Postman tool

employmentHistory.title: Software Quality Assurnace Engineer
duties: Performed routine inspections of finished products to check for defects and other problems before these products are shipped for distribution.
Tracked, documented, and reported quality levels and perform analysis for quality improvement initiatives.
Wrote clean automated scripts that test functionality using C# along with Selenium.
Conducted various tests for systems, networks, applications, databases, software.
Logged and documented errors in the tracking system (Jira).

employmentHistory.title: Software Quality Assurnace Analyst
duties: Test Driven Development and regression testing.
Affirmed that software functions according to functional and user requirements.
Extended test frameworks and automated test sets using C# and Selenium.

employmentHistory.title: APPLICATION TECH SUPPORT
duties: Followed policies and procedures related to application methods and quality standards at all times.
